plot: Documentary about the Danube, focusing on old captain Pop, a man who has been crossing its waters for forty years in his little boat.
title: La lunga strada senza polvere
plot_es: Documentary about the Danube, focusing on old captain Pop, a man who has been crossing its waters for forty years in his little boat.
plot_en: Documentary about the Danube, focusing on old captain Pop, a man who has been crossing its waters for forty years in his little boat.
